title: TEMP Folder Error after game
body:
So, I've recently had this issue come up over the past few weeks. It isn't completely game breaking, more so annoying and frustrating.

At the end of games when I click 'Continue' when victory or defeat occurs, 'leave' the game if it be in a custom, normal, or ranked I get this error. The game freezes for a moment and you can clearly hear a 'Bing' error noise. It doesn't minimize the game or anything, unless I ALT TAB out which becomes very glitchy since the client is 'bugged'. I get this TEMP folder error and then after a few moments, everything resumes and league goes back to the client.

The link provided is the only screenshot I was able to get since if I tried to ALT Tab to just the error window, League would fill the screen in complete blackness.

I haven't altered any settings since downloading league (Except turning off chat filter and newbie tutorials). I've even tried updating everything on my PC to the latest and nothing works.

Is there any fixes for this?
